description: Numbers n such that 90*R_n + 7 is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comments: Also numbers n such that 10^(n+1) - 3 is a prime number.
links: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 99...997.
Index entries for primes involving repunits
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 09 2000
extensions: More terms from Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Jan 01 2008
a(13)-a(14) derived from A089675 by _Robert Price_, Nov 01 2014
